title: St Joseph Cupertino Novena - Prayer for Tests and Exams
description: St Joseph of Cupertino was an Italian Franciscan friar to whom God gave miraculous levitations and visions. Pray this novena for help with tests and exams.

days.prayer:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Dear St Joseph of Cupertino, who while on earth did obtain from God the grace to be asked at your examination only the questions you knew, obtain for me a like favor in the examinations for which I am now preparing, and in all the trials I face in life. In return I promise to make you known and cause you to be invoked. Through Christ our Lord. Amen.

Dear St Joseph, you were an angry, frustrated child. We pray for all who struggle to express themselves, and that you help us overcome sins of anger. We pray especially for

(mention request here‚Ä¶) Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St. Joseph of Cupertino, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Dear St Joseph of Cupertino, who while on earth did obtain from God the grace to be asked at your examination only the questions you knew, obtain for me a like favor in the examinations for which I am now preparing, and in all the trials I face in life. In return I promise to make you known and cause you to be invoked. Through Christ our Lord. Amen.

Dear St Joseph, you suffered because you found it difficult to learn. We pray for all those who struggle at school. May they take comfort from the fact that although learning wasn‚Äôt easy for you, this didn‚Äôt stop you from becoming a saint. We pray especially for

(mention request here‚Ä¶) Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St. Joseph of Cupertino, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Dear St Joseph of Cupertino, who while on earth did obtain from God the grace to be asked at your examination only the questions you knew, obtain for me a like favor in the examinations for which I am now preparing, and in all the trials I face in life. In return I promise to make you known and cause you to be invoked. Through Christ our Lord. Amen.

Dear St Joseph, even the thought or mention of anything holy made you levitate in ecstasy. Grant us something of the understanding and reverence for God and his saints that you had. We pray especially for

(mention request here‚Ä¶) Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St. Joseph of Cupertino, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Dear St Joseph of Cupertino, who while on earth did obtain from God the grace to be asked at your examination only the questions you knew, obtain for me a like favor in the examinations for which I am now preparing, and in all the trials I face in life. In return I promise to make you known and cause you to be invoked. Through Christ our Lord. Amen.

Dear St Joseph, you were unjustly suspected, confined to your room and neglected by those charged with looking after you. You accepted all this with humility. We pray for all those unjustly imprisoned, and that we too may have the humility to accept injustice for the love of Christ. We pray especially for

(mention request here‚Ä¶) Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St. Joseph of Cupertino, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Dear St Joseph, because you could levitate you are the patron of travelers, especially air travelers. We pray for all those travelling that they may safely reach their destinations. We pray especially for

(mention request here‚Ä¶) Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St. Joseph of Cupertino, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Answered Prayers From This Novena

I prayed the novena for my son who was doing his final electrical engineer exam and was so worried about his final exam he got word today that he has excelled in his exam and it was without doubt due to Saint Joseph Cupertino that he has achieved this, thank you Saint Joseph you have never failed him, praise be to God.

from J.L.

Querido San Jose de Cupertino estoy rezando la novena te pido por los estudios de mi hijo para que lo ayudes atransitar con exito para para poder pasar de curso. Amen

from M.M.

I learned about St Joseph of Cupertino when I was about 12yo. My mom who told me about this novena and that she used to pray the novena too for all her exams she was young. It‚Äôs never failed me when I was at school. But at some point in my adult life, I forgot about it and had actually failed a a major professional exam twice. I was so upset. This novena just appeared in my feeds somewhere and I remembered St Joseph of Cupertino. On my 3rd set of novena, the 8th day fell on my exam date - I was so worried but I passed! Finally passed the exam. I still did the 9th day. Thank you St Joseph of Cupertino!! Miracle-worker!!

from Y.B.M.S.

Thank you St Joseph of Cupertino for prayers answered.

from C.E.

Querido San Jose de Cupertino estoy rezando la novena todo este tiempo para que lo acompa√±es a mi hijo en sus examenes trimestrales para que lo ayudes a aprobar sus materias.

from M.M.

I have been praying St Joseph of Cupertino Novena since my 100 level for Examinations , Professional Examinations & Test and he has always interceded for me.

from I.G.

Thank you St Joseph Cupertino for making everything possible. You‚Äôve enlightened and guided me during my exam yesterday and I‚Äôve passed.

from R.M.

Gracias Dios y San Jose de Cupertino mi hijo aprobo el examen de fisica pido que sigas interviniendo y ayudando a mi Hijo en sus examenes que le quedan todavia por rendir y en su examen de matematicas previo que no lo puede aprobar.

from M.M.

My son passed his phamacist intern written exam.Thank you so much St Joseph of Cupertino for your intercession. I will continue to pray this novena for my son to pass his phamacist intern oral exam.

from G.C.

I pray the Novena for St. Joseph of Cupertino to guide and help me to pass my board exam. Luckily I passed the FPLE this October 15, 2025. Thank you so much St. Joseph

from Anonymous

Good morning. Im student nurse last semester l did this novena and l cleared all my exams im grateful because l wrote wrong answers in one of the exam. Im grateful to St. Joseph Cupertino and Our Mighty God.

from R.G.

Thank you God and thank you saint Joseph of Cupertino for your intercession! My son-in-law passed the Bar exam!! I prayed to Jesus and the holy Spirit for help and asked Our Mother for her intercession and also to Saint Joseph of Cupertino everyday for months before the exam and for the three months until the test results were released I‚Äôm so grateful for the intercession we received and to God !!

from J.V.

I prayed to St Joseph Cupertino for my son Nursing Board exam and it was an answered prayer. My son successfully pass the Board Exam and now He is a registered nurse!

from M.L.

Thank you so much St Joseph of Cupertino for your powerful intercession.

My son passed his exam. I will continue to pray this novena for my son up coming exam in October.

from G.C.

I am deeply grateful for the intercession of St. Joseph of Cupertino through his novena. He truly interceded for us; especially in my case. While praying this novena, both my brother and sister successfully passed their exams. One passed the theoretical part of the dental exam, and the other passed the NCLEX to become a registered nurse. I am so thankful and will continue to seek the prayers of St. Joseph of Cupertino as I pursue my own journey to become a nurse. Amen. Thanks be to God!

from NGO

Both my son and I prayed to St. Joseph of Cupertino for success in his CAPE Unit 2 exams. He was indeed successful in all his exams. We give thanks to St. Joseph of Cupertino for interceding for us. We will be forever grateful.

from M.M & K.M

Prayed this novena for my husband as he studied for his Series 65 exam. His test was scheduled for him on the day following my novena, and by the grace of God he passed! Thank you St Joseph of Cupertino for his prayers.

from R.H.

I passed my NCLEX Exams I wrote on the 31/07/25, after I finished my 9 days novena to St Joseph of Cupertino,.Thank you Jesus

from M.R.

I pray to St Joseph of Cupertino for my son final semester phamacy OSCE exam.He finally passed after so much struggle.Thank you so much St Joseph of Cupertino.Praise to the Lord our God.

from G.C.

I have been praying for over a year for St. Joseph of Cupertino‚Äôs intercession for my daughter to pass her bar exam! I prayed the novena the nine days prior to the exam. Her results won‚Äôt get back until November, but I want to thank St. Joseph of Cupertino for his powerful support and for his intercession and for her passing! To God be the Glory! Amen!

from R.K.

I pray this Novena for my daughter during her Prometric exams and she passed the exam, there still one remaining when she reached her workplace, I will have a novena again, thank you st Joseph the Cupertino for intercerding through you , our Lord Jesus Christ hear my prayers üôèüôè üôè‚ô•Ô∏è

from T.A.

I prayed that I would get a good enough score on my AP exam to get college credit and I just found out that I did more than good enough to get college credit! I will continue to pray to St. Joseph of Cupertino for my future exams and I will encourage others to do the same!

from Anonymous

I prayed this novena to St. Joseph of Cupertino continuously throughout my exam period and for a month after, until my results were released ‚Äî and by his intercession, I passed my CFA Level 2 exam.

Just like with my Level 1 exam, I truly believe it was his help that carried me through.

Thank you, St. Joseph of Cupertino, for your powerful intercession and for helping me succeed.

from M.R.

I prayed The Novena To Saint Joseph of Cupertino ‚ù§Ô∏è last year in preparation for his feast day with the intention that he will intercede for me so I can pass my 1st professional exam. The exam took place this year and I passed in flying colors through his intercession.

My promise to Saint Joseph of Cupertino ‚ù§Ô∏è last year was that I am going to tell you about the miracle so that you can put it under his Novena page so that others can see it and praise God with me Thank you and God Bless you for all you do. Amen.

from A.E.

I pray to St. Joseph Cupertino to intercede for my daughter & she passed all Medical Step 1, Step 2, & Step 3 exams. Praise Jesus & thank you St. Joseph Cupertino üôèüôèüôè

from S.V.

I prayed a novena to St Joseph of Cupertino for my daughter‚Äôs success in taking her board exam to be a nurse practitioner. She passed her exam!! Thank you for these wonderful prayers to ask for the intercession of St. Joseph of Cupertino. I have shared my discovery of him to others and will continue to do so. Praise be to God!

from R.B.

I have been praying to St. Joseph Cupertino for my NCLEX RN exam and today my prayers were answered. I‚Äôm thankful and forever grateful. To God be the glory.

from M.K.M.

Glory to Jesus!!!!! I prayed the novena before my exams and passed, I had written this exam 5 times before and failed and on the 6th try I said the novena fervently. I believe st Joseph Cupertino interceded

from O.O.

I am really grateful to God for helping me In my exam this is really going to be long.

At first I was really afraid because this is my second time writing this exam to enter collage to study the course I want the most which is dentistry,and also to do something I really want to do which is becoming an alter server.

The pressure on me was quite much to pass the exam and I did this novena with other novena of my favorite saints.my dad always wanted me to be the best in the exam so I put in all my effort and gave it my best and after the result was release, andd I came out with a very good score and I am so happy and thankful to saint Joseph of Cupertino who interceded for me to our lord Jesus Christ.

But this is not the end I am also going for the last exam that will guarantee if I will study dentistry and become an alter server please pray for me so that I can do very well and fufill my dream thanks and God bless us all amen.

from H.B.

I prayed for my son to pass the Science finals because it is a make or break for him. Thru the intercession of St.Joseph of Cupertino, he got a grade that is high enough to pass the school year.

from A.M.

Hello, I used St. Joseph Cupertino Novena for my two board exams form Nurse Practitioner and I passed. I thank God for answering my prayers through St. Joseph Cupertino Novena.

from C.M.

I prayed this novena and my child passed medical exam. My sincere thanks to St. Joseph of Cupertino for helping us to discover and be successful in this journey.

from I.D.

Thank you Saint Joseph of Cupertino for answered prayers

from J.L.

I started this novena when I started my MPH program. I am currently getting ready for my last semester exams. The past 2 semesters, I excelled in the exams. I‚Äôm so grateful to God for the gift of St Joseph of Cupertino. I pray and believe this final semester will end in praise as well. St Joseph of Cupertino‚Ä¶.pray for us

from W.I.

I had to attend an exam to enter the residency program in my country. I wanted a radiology residency and it is the hardest program to get into. I needed more than 98 percentile to get into it.

I prayed the St. Joseph of Cupertino novena during my exam preparation. I was introduced to the novena by a close friend who had received blessings through this novena.

Thanks to the intercession of St. Joseph of Cupertino, I cleared the exam with a good score and I‚Äôll be starting my residency in radiology this month.

I want to let everyone know about the power of intercession of all the saints who are in heaven praying for us to the Father.

from A.T.

So blessed to find this Novena. I prayed it several times all the way through. My son was struggling with two classes in which a low grade would have prevented him from graduating this semester. He graduates Saturday! Thank you St. Joseph of Cupertino for your prayers. All the glory goes to God.

from M.D.

Thank you, St Joseph Cupertino! ‚ù§Ô∏è I successfully passed the physician licensure exam!! Thank you for this answered prayer. To God be the Glory!

from K.M.

I wish to thank God through st. Joseph of Cupertino, 2 Doctors who had previously failed their consultancy examinations several times‚Ä¶ passed after I did the Novena to St. Joseph of cupertino with them, 3 nurses too passed their International exams through his intercession. Thanks you St. Joseph of cupertino..

from E.C.

Thank you St. Joseph of Cupertino, my daughter passed her exams and I pray you will always intercede for her in all her exams and trials.

from A.U.

To the glory of God Almighty, my family did the novena to St. Joseph of Cupertino for my daughter‚Äôs 3rd MBBS. The result is out and it was a success. We give God all the praise.

from C.N.

Thanks to the intercession of St Joseph of Cupertino and all the saints by the grace of God I got the grades I needed in my A level exams and got into university

from P.S.P.

We are very thankful that we have known St Joseph Cupertino when we are looking for a prayer to be recited before my daughter‚Äôs scheduled Board Exams last Aug 23 and 24, 2024.

Through St Joseph Cupertino‚Äôs intercession, my daughter was able to pass her Registered Electrical Enginering Licensure Examination.

We just wanted to share this with everyone because we believe that our prayers are very powerful and nothing is impossible with God.

Thank you Lord for this wonderful blessing !

from I.A.

I prayed the novena before writing my final exams.

I felt calm before the exams and I passed my exams. I know that The Lord answered the request i made in the novena and I want to thank God.

from R.M.

All praise and thanks to St Joseph Cupertino for answering the prayers of my son and I, for his success in his year one, exams.

It was indeed a troublesome year for him. He never settled into his programme and there was always an unwillingness to continue.

By the great Intercession of St Joseph of Cupertino, who we called upon during his exams, he obtained success in all his examinations.

Thank you St Joseph of Cupertino. All praise and glory to you. We will always honour you and make you known by others.

from M.K.

I am very grateful to St Joeseph Cupertino as his blessings and support were incredible help to getting me a place at University.

from A.S.

I prayed this novena when I was about to take my ACCA final paper.

I passed my examination and became and Affiliate now. Thank You so much St. Joseph of Cupertino.

from N.A.

My daughter passed a very important healthcare national exam after this novena. Praise be to St. Joseph of Cupertino, Mary, and the Lord Almighty for this success.

Their intercession guided her through the exam. May the Lord bless her future tests and her healthcare practice.

Many Thanks!

from M.W.

I‚Äôm confident and truly believe that God will bless my grandson to pass his UCAT test on July 11, 2024 with a very high grade/score that will qualify him to enroll in college and take his desired medical course.

And so from this time on, I thank God for answering my prayer through the intercession of St.Joseph of Cupertino.

from C.J.

I had done very poorly in one subject which was difficult for everyone in my final year uni and was very sure that I wouldn‚Äôt pass.

from T.G.

from C.A.

Special thanks to St Joseph Cupertino for answered prayers as my son passed his Step 3 medical exam. You are always there for him.

My prayers have not been answered after I did the novena twice and prayed to St. Joseph of Cupertino to pass my exam.

from M.J.

Response from Devin Rose: Dear M.J., sometimes the answer to our prayers is ‚ÄúNo.‚Äù That is very hard to accept but God wills all things for our good.

I passed my exam!

I prayed a lot before, during, and after the exam. I also prayed to lots of saints and went to different churches. Studying so hard is emotionally draining.

After doing what I can, I know the right thing to do is to offer everything to God. Good efforts and lots of prayers really do payoff.

Thank you so much, St. Joseph Cupertino

from M.T.

St. Joseph of Cupertino guided my daughter through her APRN exam.

from N.K.

from O.S.

from S.J.

Thank you St. Joseph of Cupertino!

I prayed this Novena for my son to ask for intercession that he pass his flight board and he did!

from O.M.

from L.H.

I prayed this novena for nine days and nine hours.

from I.D.

Before we sat for exams, I was sick but was praying the novena to St Joseph Cupertino.
